name: Porky's Hare Hunt
summary: Porky goes after a rogue rabbit who manages to frustrate him at each turn. He is unsuccessful and the rabbit comes to visit him just to make recovery tougher for him.
info:
• 中文名: 猪小弟猎兔
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1938-04-30
  • 片长: 8 min
  • 官方网站: https://m.imdb.com/title/tt0030608/
  • 导演: Ben Hardaway
